original: @224a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @224a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra yo gi n'i ga na tsakra bi dhi n'a ma /
analyzed: badzra yo gi n'i ga na tsakra bi dhi n'a ma /
translated: Vajrayoginī gaṇacakra-vidhi-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
translated: The Ritual of the Vajrayoginī Gaṇacakra

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrayoginī.🔽In order to gather the two accumulations,🔽to restore the sacred pledge of yoga,

original: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa dang // rnal 'byor dam tshig gso ba dang // bde gshegs mkha' 'gro mchod bya'i phyir //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa dang // rnal 'byor dam tshig gso ba dang // bde gshegs mkha' 'gro mchod bya'i phyir //
translated: and to worship the dakinis of the sugatas,

original: dpa' bo'i ston mo tshogs 'khor bshad //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i ston mo tshogs 'khor bshad //
translated: I will explain the gaṇacakra feast.

original: de la ka p'a la'am snod shin tu mdzes pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nang du tshogs kyi yo byad bshams pa ni sha lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga dang dam tshig gi rdzas bdud rtsi ril bu dang gzhan yang zhal zas kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs
analyzed: de la ka p'a la'am snod shin tu mdzes pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nang du tshogs kyi yo byad bshams pa ni sha lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga dang dam tshig gi rdzas bdud rtsi ril bu dang gzhan yang zhal zas kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs
translated: In that regard, the feast articles arranged in a skull cup or vessel that has an excellent appearance and the characteristics are the five meats, the five amṛtas, the samaya substances, the amṛta pills, and also various special foods,🔽such as things to eat and drink, and so on.

original: pa dang bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i longs spyod bya ba rnams bshams la ras dmar pos g-yogs la gzhag go //
analyzed: pa dang bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i longs spyod bya ba rnams bshams la ras dmar pos g-yogs la gzhag go //
translated: Arrange those, cover them with a red cloth, and set them aside.

original: der dang por rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad khrus byas te /
analyzed: der dang por rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad khrus byas te /
translated: First of all, all the male and female yogis bathe.

original: bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzang pos lus byugs te /🔽gos sar pa dang / rus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang mgo la me tog bzhag pa'am /
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzang pos lus byugs te / gos sar pa dang / rus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang mgo la me tog bzhag pa'am /
translated: They anoint their bodies with the five nectars and fragrant substances.🔽They put on new clothes and ornaments of bone, etc., and place flowers on their heads.

original: phreng ba bcings te thig btab pa'i le'u tshe'am /
analyzed: phreng ba bcings te thig btab pa'i le'u tshe'am /
translated: Or they tie a garland and sit in a square marked with a swastika.

original: pho mos spos pa rang rang gi gnas su 'dug ste /
analyzed: pho mos spos pa rang rang gi gnas su 'dug ste /
translated: The men and women sit in their respective places.

original: rje btsun ma'i rnal 'byor du bya ste /
analyzed: rje btsun ma'i rnal 'byor du bya ste /
translated: They perform the yoga of the Venerable Lady.

original: de la las kyi slob dpon gyis mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim pa ltar dbul lo //
analyzed: de la las kyi slob dpon gyis mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim pa ltar dbul lo //
translated: The ritual master offers the five offerings in sequence.

original: de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis tshogs byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis tshogs byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
translated: Then the master of the feast should consecrate the feast.

original: rdzas rnams kyi 'og tu ae las chos 'byung bsam /
analyzed: rdzas rnams kyi 'og tu ae las chos 'byung bsam /
translated: Below the substances, think of a source of phenomena from e.

original: de'i steng du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu bkang pa lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po //
analyzed: de'i steng du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu bkang pa lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po //
translated: Above that, from yaṃ, is a wind mandala in the form of a bow, marked with pennants. Above that, from raṃ, is a triangular red fire mandala.

original: de nas aom a'a: h'um gsum las skyed pu mi mgo skam po gsum de'i steng du aa las thod pa skam po'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga zla bas kha bkab pa /
analyzed: de nas aom a'a: h'um gsum las skyed pu mi mgo skam po gsum de'i steng du aa las thod pa skam po'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga zla bas kha bkab pa /
translated: Then, from the three syllables oṃ āḥ hūṃ, there are three human heads with dry skulls. Upon that, from a, there is a skull cup filled with the five meats and five elixirs, the nature of the five tathāgatas, covered with a moon.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje lte ba la h'um /
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje lte ba la h'um /
translated: Upon that, there is a vajra with hūṃ at the hub.

original: de la 'od zer spro @224b bsdu byas pas /
analyzed: de la 'od zer spro @224b bsdu byas pas /
translated: Light rays emanate and return,

original: rlung gis me sbar bas de rnams bzhu nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis khams gsum dang dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs pa la rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin du bsams la /
analyzed: rlung gis me sbar bas de rnams bzhu nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis khams gsum dang dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs pa la rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin du bsams la /
translated: the wind blows, the fire blazes, and they melt. The nature of the elixir is invited from all buddhas residing in the three realms and three times.

original: de nas gtor ma chen pos mchod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gtor ma chen pos mchod par bya ste /
translated: Then, make offerings with the great bali.

original: tshogs kyi phung bcad de de lag tu thogs nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: tshogs kyi phung bcad de de lag tu thogs nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: Cut off a piece of the gaṇacakra and, holding it in the hand, recite this:

original: aom badzra b'a r'a hr'i panytsa ta th'a ga ta aargham p'u dza y'a mi /🔽pushpam dza y'a mi /
analyzed: aom badzra b'a r'a hr'i panytsa ta th'a ga ta aargham p'u dza y'a mi / pushpam dza y'a mi /
translated: oṃ vajra-varāhī pañca-tathāgata-arghaṃ pūja-yā mi🔽puṣpam ja-yā mi

original: dh'u pam p'um dza y'a mi /
analyzed: dh'u pam p'um dza y'a mi /
translated: dhūpam pūṃ ja-yā mi

original: d'i pam p'u dza y'a mi /🔽gandha p'u dza y'a mi /
analyzed: d'i pam p'u dza y'a mi / gandha p'u dza y'a mi /
translated: I offer the worship of sound.

original: nee bi dye p'u dza y'a mi /🔽a'a darsha p'u dza y'a mi /
analyzed: nee bi dye p'u dza y'a mi / a'a darsha p'u dza y'a mi /
translated: I offer the worship of smell.🔽I offer the worship of mental objects.🔽I offer the worship of sight.

original: shapta p'u dza y'a mi /
analyzed: shapta p'u dza y'a mi /
translated: I offer the worship of touch.

original: zhes glur blangs la lha mo brgyad kyis mchod do //
analyzed: zhes glur blangs la lha mo brgyad kyis mchod do //
translated: Thus, the eight goddesses offer worship with this song.🔽Then, the ritual master imagines that the leftovers are the bali offering and sings this song:

original: de nas las kyi slob dpon gyis phud rnams gtor mar bsams la gu ru aa dhishsh'a na ma h'a ba la badzra pra t'i tstsha ho:/
analyzed: de nas las kyi slob dpon gyis phud rnams gtor mar bsams la gu ru aa dhishsh'a na ma h'a ba la badzra pra t'i tstsha ho:/
translated: Guru Adhiṣṭhāna Mahābal Vajra Pratīccha Hoḥ.

original: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi bhu nydza ho:/🔽badzra d'a ki n'i /
analyzed: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi bhu nydza ho:/ badzra d'a ki n'i /
translated: Kha kha khāhi khāhi Bhunja Hoḥ.🔽Vajra dakini.

original: buddha d'a ki n'i /
analyzed: buddha d'a ki n'i /
translated: Buddha dakini.

original: ratna d'a ki n'i /
analyzed: ratna d'a ki n'i /
translated: Ratna dakini.

original: padma d'a ki n'i /
analyzed: padma d'a ki n'i /
translated: Padma dakini.

original: karmma d'a ki n'i /
analyzed: karmma d'a ki n'i /
translated: Karma dakini.

original: aadhishshr'i na ma h'a ba lim pra t'i tstsha ho //
analyzed: aadhishshr'i na ma h'a ba lim pra t'i tstsha ho //
translated: Adhiṣṭhāna Mahābalim Pratīccha Hoḥ.

original: zhes glur blang zhing lha'i ming sbyar la dbul lo //
analyzed: zhes glur blang zhing lha'i ming sbyar la dbul lo //
translated: Thus, the song is sung and the offerings are made by applying the names of the deities.

original: de nas las kyi slob dpon gyis tshogs kyi slob dpon la sogs pa kun gyi mdun du mandala bya ste /
analyzed: de nas las kyi slob dpon gyis tshogs kyi slob dpon la sogs pa kun gyi mdun du mandala bya ste /
translated: Then, the ritual master makes a maṇḍala in front of the gaṇapati and so on,

original: rdo rje lag skor dang bcas pas gar bya zhing /
analyzed: rdo rje lag skor dang bcas pas gar bya zhing /
translated: performs the vajra dance with the vajra in hand,🔽and sings this song:

original: khyed ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i mchog / bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba'i //
analyzed: khyed ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i mchog / bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba'i //
translated: filled with the taste of great bliss.

original: de yi rkyen du dbul lags kyis //
analyzed: de yi rkyen du dbul lags kyis //
translated: I offer this to you as a condition.

original: dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis bzhes su gsol //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis bzhes su gsol //
translated: Please accept it with a joyful expression.

original: de nas bza' ba dang btung pa la sogs pas tshim pa dang khyad par dang thun mong du byas la /
analyzed: de nas bza' ba dang btung pa la sogs pas tshim pa dang khyad par dang thun mong du byas la /
translated: Then, having satisfied them with food, drink, and so on, do the special and general offerings.

original: rnal 'byor pho mo kun langs la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pho mo kun langs la //
translated: All the male and female yogis rise up

original: rdo rje'i gar dang glu blang bar bya //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gar dang glu blang bar bya //
translated: and perform the vajra dance and singing.

original: aom badzra d'a ki n'i p'u dza y'a mi /
analyzed: aom badzra d'a ki n'i p'u dza y'a mi /
translated: Oṃ vajra dakini pūjā āyāmi.

original: zhes mkha' 'gro ma lnga glur blang ngo //
analyzed: zhes mkha' 'gro ma lnga glur blang ngo //
translated: Thus, one should sing the song of the five dakinis.

original: gzhan yang skad cig glur blang ba ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang skad cig glur blang ba ni //
translated: Moreover, the song of the moment is:

original: ae ma ho// 'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: ae ma ho// 'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa //
translated: Emaho! Kissing, embracing, and so on,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig ma //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig ma //
translated: the various moments,

original: dga' ba'i longs spyod rab tu 'bul //
analyzed: dga' ba'i longs spyod rab tu 'bul //
translated: I offer the enjoyment of joy.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //🔽sgeg dang lta ba sogs pa //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o // sgeg dang lta ba sogs pa //
translated: The various many

original: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma //
translated: are the moment of the ripening of

original: mchog dga'i longs spyod rab tu dbul //
analyzed: mchog dga'i longs spyod rab tu dbul //
translated: the enjoyment of supreme joy.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //
translated: The various many🔽are the moment of the enjoyment of the supreme joy.

original: bde ba'i ston mo la sogs pa //
analyzed: bde ba'i ston mo la sogs pa //
translated: The feast of bliss and so forth

original: rnam par smin ma'i skad cig ma //
analyzed: rnam par smin ma'i skad cig ma //
translated: is the moment of the ripening of the dance.

original: mchod dga'i longs spyod rab tu dbul //
analyzed: mchod dga'i longs spyod rab tu dbul //
translated: The enjoyment of the offering of worship is the poverty of

original: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'o //
translated: the variety of many kinds.

original: bde ba'i ston mo la sogs pa //
analyzed: bde ba'i ston mo la sogs pa //
translated: The feast of bliss and so forth

original: rnam pa med dang mtshan nyid bral //
analyzed: rnam pa med dang mtshan nyid bral //
translated: is the absence of aspects and the absence of characteristics.

original: dga' bral lhan skyes longs spyod dbul //
analyzed: dga' bral lhan skyes longs spyod dbul //
translated: The enjoyment of the poverty of the innate free of joy

original: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i //🔽ma lus @225a * //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i // ma lus @225a * //
translated: is the variety of many kinds.

original: pa yi 'jig rten kyang //
analyzed: pa yi 'jig rten kyang //
translated: The entire world

original: nam mkha' kun gyi rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: nam mkha' kun gyi rnal 'byor ba //
translated: is the yoga of all space.

original: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la zhugs shing //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la zhugs shing //
translated: Engaged in the characteristic of space,

original: thams cad mkha' ltar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkha' ltar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: all is enjoyed like the sky.

original: de rnams glur blang ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams glur blang ba'o //
translated: That is the song.

original: de nas lhag ma bsdus la mkha' 'gro ma'i gtor ma dang lhan cig tu bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas lhag ma bsdus la mkha' 'gro ma'i gtor ma dang lhan cig tu bzhag la /
translated: Then, having gathered the leftovers, place them together with the dakini bali.

original: aom badzra d'a ki n'i pa lim pra t'i tstsha ho //
analyzed: aom badzra d'a ki n'i pa lim pra t'i tstsha ho //
translated: Om vajra dakini baliṃ te pūja hoḥ

original: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi bhu nydza ho:/
analyzed: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi bhu nydza ho:/
translated: kha kha khāhi khāhi bhuñja hoḥ

original: zhes lhag ma bsdus la gtang ngo //
analyzed: zhes lhag ma bsdus la gtang ngo //
translated: Recite that and offer the leftovers.

original: de nas chos skyong gi gtor ma rang gi cho ga ltar gtang ngo //
analyzed: de nas chos skyong gi gtor ma rang gi cho ga ltar gtang ngo //
translated: Then, one should offer the bali of the Dharma protectors according to one's ritual.

original: gtor ma gsum gtong ba'i tshe //
analyzed: gtor ma gsum gtong ba'i tshe //
translated: When offering the three bali offerings,🔽one should recite the following:🔽The assembly of heroes and heroines,🔽and the host of vajra dakinis,

original: dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas dang // zhes pa la sogs pa brjod do //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas dang // zhes pa la sogs pa brjod do //
translated: and so forth.

original: de nas smon lam gdab ste //
analyzed: de nas smon lam gdab ste //
translated: Then, one should make aspirations:

original: skye ba gang thob de dang der //
analyzed: skye ba gang thob de dang der //
translated: In whatever births I may have,🔽may I always be born in a family🔽that is rich, wealthy, and prosperous,🔽and have a long life free from illness.🔽 May all beings attain🔽the state of Vajradaka,

original: don kun sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: don kun sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: the goal of all the buddhas.🔽May I attain that very state,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i go 'phang de //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i go 'phang de //
translated: the mantra of the vajra of enlightenment,🔽the mind of perfect enlightenment,

original: 'gro ba kun gyis thob par shog / byang chub rdo rje sngags pa dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems thob dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyis thob par shog / byang chub rdo rje sngags pa dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems thob dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am //
translated: and the conduct of the perfect buddha.🔽May I be born in a family

original: bdag ni de nyid thob par shog / rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
analyzed: bdag ni de nyid thob par shog / rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
translated: that is rich, wealthy, and prosperous,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i smon lam yang gdab bo //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i smon lam yang gdab bo //
translated: and have a long life free from illness.🔽Then, one should recite:

original: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a mandala mu:/
analyzed: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a mandala mu:/
translated: Om. The mandala of emptiness. Mu.

original: zhes pa ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro gshegs su gso /
analyzed: zhes pa ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro gshegs su gso /
translated: Thus, one should request the departure of the wisdom dakinis.

original: dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro rnams rang la bsdu /
analyzed: dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro rnams rang la bsdu /
translated: The commitment ḍākinīs are gathered into oneself.

original: rang mi dmigs par stong pa nyid du bsams te /
analyzed: rang mi dmigs par stong pa nyid du bsams te /
translated: One imagines oneself as being unobservable and empty.

original: skye ba med par rgyas gdab bo //
analyzed: skye ba med par rgyas gdab bo //
translated: One seals it with non-arising.

original: de nas rje btsun ma'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rje btsun ma'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam la gnas par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should remain in the conduct with the pride of the Venerable Lady.

original: rdo rje phag mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba grub pa thob pa sha ba ri zhags kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba grub pa thob pa sha ba ri zhags kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ritual of the gaṇacakra of Vajravārāhī, called “The Accomplished One,” composed by Śavaripa, is complete.

original: // / yul ma ga dh'a'i pandi ta goo ta ma bha dra'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te ;
analyzed: // / yul ma ga dh'a'i pandi ta goo ta ma bha dra'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te ;
translated: It was well heard from the presence of the Magadha paṇḍita Gautama Bhadra.

original: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos //
analyzed: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos //
translated: The Tibetan translator, the Śākya bhikṣu Nyima Gyaltsen Pal Zangpo,

original: nya ro khros kyi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: nya ro khros kyi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: well translated it at the temple of Nyaro Kha.
